Can you provide a test case that resulted in this NPE?  

From the trace it looks like you were attempting to evaluate a code snippet?

If this is true and it was in remote debug target, we currently do not support 
remote evaluation. Please see bug 1526 Remote Evaulation (AST evaluation) for 
more details.  

Or was the evaluation attempting to start the remote target?  If so the code 
evaluated would help in finding the problem.

Either way, more details would be appreciated.
Increased priority due to NPE, but more details are required.

I have been trying to recreate this problem.  I am not sure how I did it.  All 
I know is that I was just trying to start to debug.

We may just need to close this bug report and I will open a new one if I can 
find a reproducible scenario.
